TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the QRCode activity. QRCode activity is a simple QR Code generator and reader
TutoPhotoContent: Click here to scan a QR code through Camera of your device
TutoPNGContent: Click this icon to export the QR Code in Journal as a PNG file
TutoGenerateContent: Click this icon to launch generation
TutoListContent: Click here to get a list of previously generated QR Codes
TutoQRContent: Here is shown the generated QR Code
TutoInputContent: Type here the text you want to generate as a QR Code
